TEXT.TITLE: DANIEL <DAN> UNIT GETS PIPELINE CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: Daniel Industries Inc said its Measurement and Control Division has been awarded a contract valued at about 7.5 mln dlrs by <SPIE Capag S.A.> for metering and control systerms for 11 stations on the USSR - Turkey Pipeline System Project. Reuter
